head.title: Shuffle at the Top For Curative Health

hedline.hl1: Shuffle at the Top For Curative Health

abstract.p: Curative Health Services appoints president and chief executive John Vakoutis chairman; nmes Lawrence P English to board (S)

block.p: Curative Health Services Inc. appointed John Vakoutis, the president and chief executive, to be chairman. The company (Nasdaq: CURE), which is based in Melville, serves companies involved in care of patients suffering from chronic wounds. Mr. Vakoutis succeeds Lawrence Stuesser, who left May 31.
The company also said Lawrence P. English, a former president of Cigna Healthcare, is joining the board.

Curative Health Services Inc. appointed John Vakoutis, the president and chief executive, to be chairman. The company (Nasdaq: CURE), which is based in Melville, serves companies involved in care of patients suffering from chronic wounds. Mr. Vakoutis succeeds Lawrence Stuesser, who left May 31.
The company also said Lawrence P. English, a former president of Cigna Healthcare, is joining the board.
The shuffle reflects the influence of the Feshbach brothers, Joseph and Matthew, outside investors who gained a board seat in February, according to Thomas Axmacher, vice president for finance.
